original_solution_mapping.L1: On a regular day it would take 3*12=<<3*12=36>>36 minutes
original_solution_mapping.L2: With the leak it will take 5*12=<<5*12=60>>60 minutes
original_solution_mapping.L3: It will take 60-36=<<60-36=24>>24 more minutes if the leak goes undetected

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6145.
    Returns: the extra time it takes to fill 12 barrels with a leak.
    """
    # L1
    normal_fill_time_per_barrel = 3 # 3 minutes
    num_barrels = 12 # 12 barrels of soda
    normal_total_time = normal_fill_time_per_barrel * num_barrels

    # L2
    leak_fill_time_per_barrel = 5 # took 5 minutes to fill one barrel
    leak_total_time = leak_fill_time_per_barrel * num_barrels

    # L3
    extra_time = leak_total_time - normal_total_time

    # FA
    answer = extra_time
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: On a regular day it would take {normal_fill_time_per_barrel}*{num_barrels}=<<{normal_fill_time_per_barrel}*{num_barrels}={normal_total_time}>>{normal_total_time} minutes
With the leak it will take {leak_fill_time_per_barrel}*{num_barrels}=<<{leak_fill_time_per_barrel}*{num_barrels}={leak_total_time}>>{leak_total_time} minutes
It will take {leak_total_time}-{normal_total_time}=<<{leak_total_time}-{normal_total_time}={extra_time}>>{extra_time} more minutes if the leak goes undetected
